thread.title: Joyce Lamarra
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Joyce Lamarra

author: Joyce Lamarra
title: Joyce Lamarra
text:
We had the best service with Gardner White, We Love our Living room set Mark Gattinger was so helpful & patient with us finding the right furniture for us. amazing service we've had in long time, we will never go back to the other furniture store. We will be back to Gardner White for our furniture from now on. The delivery guys was awesome also very nice & friendly & helpful. Thank you Gardner White :)
Joyce LaMarra
